overview: A laundromat at night. A woman asks a stranger to try on her husband's shirt, fearing that it has shrunk. As she asks him to rehearse the reunion between her and her husband, the clumsy rehearsal creates a rapprochement between the two unknowns.
tagline: A laundromat at night. A woman asks a stranger to try on her husband's shirt, fearing that it has shrunk.
title: The Rehearsal
